long_description: The SunCloud Poptown polarized sunglasses offers a face-flattering shape and fit. You'll be wishing for sunny days just so you can wear them! Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection-molded polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Purple backpaint frames feature polarized gray lenses; brown fade laser frames feature brown polarized lenses. 8-base-curve lenses; (the higher the number the more curved the lens(TM)SunCloud features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature). Includes a microfiber storage bag. SunCloud Poptown polarized sunglasses are designed to fit medium size faces.
short_description: The SunCloud Poptown polarized sunglasses offers a face-flattering shape and fit. You'll be wishing for sunny days just so you can wear them!
